item.title: 数学题
item.author: Author
item.description: 第一题 $$ 求 \lim_{x \to \infty} \frac{[(1+\frac{1}{x})^x]^x}{e^x} 的极限 $$ $$ 解: 原式 = \lim_{x \to \infty} \left[(1+\frac{1}{x})^x \right]^x \cdot e^{-x} $$ $$ \because x \to \infty, (1 + \frac{1}{x})^x \to e $$ $$ \therefore x \to \infty, \left[(1+\frac{1}{x})^x \right]^x \to e^x $$ $$ \therefore 原式 = \lim_{x \to \infty} \left[(1+\frac{1}{x})^x\right]^x \cdot e^{-x} = \lim_{x \to \infty} e^x \cdot e^{-x} $$ $$ \because e^x \cdot e^{-x} = e^{x-x} = e^0 = 1 $$
